Name: Huis van Iemand Anders
Review Text: Grew up in this neighborhood and it's nice see there's a new, cosy.. welcoming bar there. Became pretty busy around 21-ish. Bar staff was friendly. Visitors age was late 20's up to about 38. Good mixed of people. Nice beer selection against ‚Ä¶

Name: Huis van Iemand Anders
Review Text: Last weekend I had one of the best parties over there. Friendly staff, great music, nice selection of beers. You could hang at the bar, flop on one of the sofas in the mid area or dance in the hall at the back

Name: Huis van Iemand Anders
Review Text: Great little cosy place,doesnt seem much but i can assure you is a hell of a place,nice staff,door staff nice and pleasant aswell,nice ambience,and automatically the crowd is nice aswell..thank you for a quiet relaxing night!

Name: Huis van Iemand Anders

Name: Huis van Iemand Anders
Review Text: If I would drink alcohol, this would be my 2nd home. Great venue with an unpretentious atmosphere. Luckily I cook good food, so I get to be their caterer once in a while!

Name: Huis van Iemand Anders
